name: RowentaSmarthome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the vacuum cleaner”
”Alexa, stop the vacuum cleaner”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
No more cleaning, discover an intelligent and autonomous way to clean with Rowenta robots.
In order to be able to use "Rowenta Smarthome" you must first connect your robot with the Rowenta Robots application.

You must then in Amazon Alexa log in with the same account to "Rowenta Smarthome" in order to be able to control your products by voice.

Here are some of the phrases you can use to control your products:

START-UP
• “Alexa, turn on the vacuum cleaner. "

STOP
• “Alexa, stop the vacuum cleaner. "
